title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the NBA Playoff action from last night. Which former NBA player does JA Morant's career resemble most? NFL Network's Tom Pelissero calls in to preview tomorrow night's NFL Draft. Where does he expect there to be drama? And Reggie Miller discusses his recent comments about Ben Simmons. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
